channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache -- Apache UIMA DUCC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache -- Apache UIMA DUCC

item.title: CVE-2018-8035|2024-08-05T06:46:12.231Z -- apache -- apache%20uima%20ducc
item.description: This vulnerability relates to the user's browser processing of DUCC webpage input data.The javascript comprising Apache UIMA DUCC (<= 2.2.2) which runs in the user's browser does not sufficiently filter user supplied inputs, which may result in unintended execution of user supplied javascript code.
